import "./postDetail.css" import {Link, useParams} from "react-router-dom"; import {useDispatch, useSelector} from "react-redux"; import {fetchPostDetail, getPost, getPostsStatus, likePost, reset} from "../../redux/postsSlice"; import {useEffect, useState} from "react"; import {useAuth} from "../../hooks"; import TimeAgo from "./TimeAgo"; import Loading from "../../components/Loading/Loading"; import { ChatBubbleOutline, FavoriteBorder, Share, BookmarkBorder, MoreHoriz, SentimentSatisfiedAlt, Favorite } from "@mui/icons-material"; const PostDetail = () => { const auth = useAuth() const dispatch = useDispatch() const { postId } = useParams() const post = useSelector(getPost) const status = useSelector(getPostsStatus) const [likes, setLikes] = useState([]) const hasLikedPost = post?.likes?.find((like) => like === auth._id) const handleLike = () => { dispatch(likePost({id: post._id, userId: auth._id})) .unwrap() .then() .catch(err => { return err.message }) if (hasLikedPost) { setLikes(post.likes.filter((id) => id !== auth._id)); } else { setLikes([...post.likes, auth._id]); } } useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetchPostDetail({id: postId})) return () => { dispatch(reset()) } }, [postId]); useEffect(() => { setLikes(post?.likes) },[post]) if (status === "loading") { return } else if (status === "succeeded" && post === "Request failed with status code 500") { return (
